name: Tales of Wind: Radiant Rebirth
summary:
Start your adventure in Tales of Wind: Radiant Rebirth today – the epic action MMORPG loved by millions, now more vibrant than ever.

Tales of Wind: Radiant Rebirth is a vibrant and action-packed MMORPG that blends classic fantasy with innovative mechanics, designed to keep you hooked on mobile and PC. Get ready for a brand-new adventure with smoother gameplay, more customization, and an expanded world to explore!

Explore the world of La Place, a city blessed by the gods, now under the shadow of dark forces. Your power is needed to uncover the truth and restore the light.
